abstract: In a civil suit, the department said Oracle failed its contractual duty to give the government the same discounts it gave commercial customers.
snippet: In a civil suit, the department said Oracle failed its contractual duty to give the government the same discounts it gave commercial customers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The Justice Department has joined a whistle-blower in accusing Oracle, the business software giant, of defrauding the federal government by overcharging for software.

headline.main: Justice Joins Whistle-Blower in Suit Accusing Oracle of Overcharging U.S.
headline.print_headline: Justice Joins Whistle-Blower in Suit Accusing Oracle of Overcharging U.S.

abstract: The Justice Department has joined a whistle-blower in accusing Oracle, the business software giant, of defrauding the federal government by overcharging for software.
snippet: The Justice Department has joined a whistle-blower in accusing Oracle, the business software giant, of defrauding the federal government by overcharging for software.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has joined a whistle-blower in accusing Oracle, the business software giant, of defrauding the federal government by overcharging for software, The New York Times’s Ashlee Vance reported.

headline.main: D.O.J. Joins Suit Accusing Oracle of Overcharging U.S.
